name: Pattern Hammer (digital version)
description:
Both players secretly choose two colors/patterns. You win if you can connect

your two opposite corners using only those two colors/patterns. During your

turn you must both place a block and destroy/fix one that has already been

placed. Try to figure out your opponent's colors/patterns while also keeping

yours secret! A quick game of deception and strategy!

by Jodediah Holems
